```{r}
rrmse <- function(true, pred, k) {
  sqrt(sum((pred - true[k])^2) / length(pred)) * 100 / (0.5 * abs(true[1] - true[2]))
}

sd_to_snr <- function(s, sd) {
  10 * log10(sum(abs(s)^2) / sd^2)
}

snr_to_sd <- function(s, snr) {
  sqrt(sum(abs(s)^2) / 10^(snr / 10))
}
```

```{r}
compare_htls <- function() {
  noise <- CCSWGN(N, 0, sd)
  x <- s + noise
  
  est <- list(
    esprit = parestimate(ssa(x, L = L_esprit), groups = groups_esprit, drop = FALSE),
    htlsd = HTLSDstack(
      x,
      D = D,
      L = L_htlsd,
      groups = groups_htlsd,
      method = "base"
    ),
    tens = HTLSDstack(
      x,
      D = D,
      L = L_tens,
      groups = groups_tens,
      method = "hooi",
      r3 = r3,
      est_dim = est_dim,
      status = FALSE
    )
  )
  
  sapply(est, function(m)
    sapply(m, function(e)
      c(
        rates = e$rates, frequencies = e$freq
      )))
}
```


# Example from [paper](https://doi.org/10.1002/cem.1212)
```{r}

# Example 1
A <- c(1, 1)
phi <- c(0, 0)
rate <- c(0, 0)
freq <- c(0.2, 0.205)
L_esprit <- 500
L_htlsd <- 50
L_tens <- 50
D <- 10
groups_esprit <- list(1:2)
groups_htlsd <- list(1:2)
groups_tens <- list(1:2)
r3 <- 2
est_dim <- 1
dt <- 0.1
N <- 1000
true_freq <- freq * dt

s <- colSums(A * exp(1i * phi) * exp((-rate + 1i * 2 * pi * freq) %o% seq(
  from = dt,
  length.out = N,
  by = dt
)))
```

```{r}
sd <- snr_to_sd(s, snr = 30)
R <- 100

estims <- replicate(R, compare_htls())
```
